titles.title: Reinforcing American-Made Products Act of 2017
To make exclusive the authority of the Federal Government to regulate the labeling of products made in the United States and introduced in interstate or foreign commerce, and for other purposes.
Reinforcing American-Made Products Act of 2017

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Digital Commerce and Consumer Protection.

bill.summary:
Reinforcing American-Made Products Act of 2017
This bill specifies that the Federal Trade Commission's regulation of the labeling of products as "Made in the U.S.A." or "Made in America" supersedes any conflicting state laws.
